short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Don't see chess.com ratings while playing

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: If like me you don't like to see the chess ratings displayed while playing on chess.com, install Chess play with no rating. When I use it I feel more focused on the game and less on my performances
